name: bainbridge blues pouch . . .
description:
a wonderful zippered pouch . . . perfect for make-up . . . check-book . . . or art pencils . . . all in wonderful Bainbridge Blues fabrics . . .

Finished size is approximately . . . 4 1/2 " x 7 1/2 ".

The fabrics used for these pouches . . . are designed on Bainbridge Island . . . made from 100% hemp which is woven in Italy . . . and printed here in the USA . . . and manufactured locally. 

The fabric yardage is available to the design trade . . . through select design showrooms.  

www.bainbridgeblues.com

name: "hattie" pillow . . . SOLD OUT . . . custom order available
description:
A 20" x 20" pillow in "hattie" (lt. blue / red) . . . with "timothy" (cream / red) for the accent welt.  The pillow includes a wonderful feather / down insert.

The fabrics are designed on Bainbridge Island . . . made from 100% hemp which is woven in Italy . . . and printed here in the USA  . . . and manufactured locally.

Pillows available by custom order - approximate delivery 6-8 weeks.
 
The fabric yardage is available to the design trade . . . through select design showrooms.  

www.bainbridgeblues.com

name: bainbridge blues apron . . .
description:
The Bainbridge Blues Apron is a short utility apron . . . with two large pockets in the front.

The aprons are made of 100% linen from Italy . . . with our very own "katie" bird hand silk-screened in red . . . manufactured locally.

name: bainbridge blues - laundry bag . . .
description:
A fantastic laundry bag . . . in our "william" (cream / red) . . . with  "bryn" (cream / red) as the lining and a cotton cord to cinch it tight.  

The fabrics used for these bags . . . are designed on Bainbridge Island . . . made from 100% hemp which is woven in Italy . . . printed here in the USA . . . and manufactured locally.
